mapper.insert: INSERT INTO goods_comment(comment_id, goods_id, comment_cont, comment_fplid, comment_pic, goods_emp_id, comment_emp_id, dateline,starNumber) VALUES (#{id}, #{goodsId}, #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fplid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{comment_pic,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{goodsEmpId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{empId}, #{dateline}, #{starNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: UPDATE goods_comment set is_del='1' WHERE comment_id=#{comment_id}
mapper.select: SELECT gc.*, le.emp_name as nick_name, le.emp_cover as cover, gt.comment_emp_id as f_emp_id, lp.emp_name as f_nick_name, lgoods.goods_name as goods_name FROM goods_comment gc LEFT JOIN lx_emp le ON gc.comment_emp_id=le.emp_id LEFT JOIN goods_comment gt ON gc.comment_fplid=gt.comment_id LEFT JOIN lx_emp lp ON gt.comment_emp_id=lp.emp_id LEFT JOIN paopao_goods lgoods ON lgoods.goods_id=gc.goods_id WHERE 1=1 and gc.comment_id=#{id}
